00051     /**
00052      * connect to the database
00053      */
00054     function connect() {
00055         $this->link = mysql_connect($this->dbconfig['host'], $this->dbconfig['login'], $this->dbconfig['password']);
00056         if (!$this->link) {
00057             throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not connect to server " . $this->dbconfig['host']);
00058         }
00059         if (!mysql_select_db($this->dbconfig['database'], $this->link)) {
00060             throw new DatabaseConnectException("Could not select database " . $this->dbconfig['database']);
00061         }
00062 
00063         if (!empty ($this->dbconfig['encoding'])) {
00064             $this->setEncoding($this->dbconfig['encoding']);
00065         }
00066     }
00067 
00068     /**
00069      * if we are already connected
00070      * @return bool
00071      */
00072     function isConnected() {
00073         return (bool) $this->link;
00074     }
00075 
00076     /**
00077      * return the current link to the database, connect first if needed
00078      */
00079     public function getLink() {
00080         if (!$this->link) {
00081             $this->connect();
00082         }
00083         return $this->link;
00084     }

00087      * inject database link into dbo

00089     public function setLink($l) {
00090         $this->link = $l;

00093     /**
00094      * execute this query
00095      * @return mixed
00096      */
00097     private function execute($sql) {
00098         if (!$this->link) {
00099             $this->connect();
00100         }
00101 
00102         $start = microtime(true);
00103         $this->result = mysql_query($sql, $this->link);
00104 
00105         if (false === $this->result) {
00106             switch (mysql_errno($this->link)) {
00107                 case 1062:
00108                     throw new DatabaseDuplicateException(mysql_error($this->link));
00109                     break;
00110                 default:
00111                     writeLog(mysql_error($this->link) . ': ' . $sql, KATA_ERROR);
00112                     throw new DatabaseErrorException(mysql_error($this->link),$sql);
00113                     break;
00114             }
00115         }
00116         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00117             $this->queries[] = array (
00118                 kataFunc::getLineInfo(),
00119                 trim($sql),
00120                 mysql_affected_rows($this->link),
00121                 mysql_error($this->link),
00122                  (microtime(true) - $start) . 'sec'
00123             );
00124         }
00125     }

00127     /**
00128      * unused right now, later possibly used by model to set right encoding
00129      */
00130     function setEncoding($enc) {
00131         $this->execute('SET NAMES ' . $enc);
00132         return $this->result;
00133     }

00135     /**
00136      * return numbers of rows affected by last query
00137      * @return int
00138      */
00139     private function lastAffected() {
00140         if ($this->link) {
00141             return mysql_affected_rows($this->link);
00142         }
00143         $null = null;
00144         return $null;
00145     }
00146 
00147     /**
00148      * return id of primary key of last insert
00149      * @return int
00150      */
00151     private function lastInsertId() {
00152         //may lie to you: http://bugs.mysql.com/bug.php?id=26921
00153         $id = mysql_insert_id($this->link);
00154         if ($id) {
00155             return $id;
00156         }
00157         //may lie to you: if you have an auto-increment-table and you supply a primary key LAST_INSERT_ID is unchanged
00158         $result = $this->query("SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id");
00159         if (!empty ($result)) {
00160             return $result[0]['id'];
00161         }
00162         $null = null;
00163         return $null;
00164     }
00165 
00166     /**
00167      * return the result of the last query.
00168      * @param mixed $idname if $idname is false keys are simply incrementing from 0, if $idname is string the key is the value of the column specified in the string
00169      */
00170     private function & lastResult($idnames = false) {
00171         $result = array ();
00172         if (@ mysql_num_rows($this->result) > 0) {
00173             if ($idnames === false) {
00174                 while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($this->result)) {
00175                     $result[] = $row;
00176                 }
00177             } else {
00178                 while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($this->result)) {
00179                     $current = & $result;
00180                     foreach ($idnames as $idname) {
00181                         if (!isset($row[$idname])) {
00182                             throw new InvalidArgumentException('Cant order result by a field thats not in the resultset (forgot to select it?)');
00183                         }
00184                         if ($row[$idname] === null) {
00185                             $row[$idname] = 'null';
00186                         }
00187                         $current = & $current[$row[$idname]];
00188                     } //foreach
00189                     $current = $row;
00190                 } //while fetch
00191             } //idnames
00192         } //rows>0
00193         return $result;
00194     }
00195 
00196     /**
00197      * REPLACE works exactly like INSERT,
00198      * except that if an old row in the table has the same value as a new row for a PRIMARY KEY or a UNIQUE  index,
00199      * the old row is deleted before the new row is inserted
00200      *
00201      * @param string $tableName replace from this table
00202      * @param array $fields name=>value pairs of new values
00203      * @param string $pairs enquoted names to escaped pairs z.B.[name]='value'
00204      * @return int modified rows.
00205      */
00206     function replace($tableName, $fields, $pairs) {
00207         return $this->query('REPLACE INTO ' . $tableName . ' SET ' . $pairs);
00208     }
00209 
00210     /**
00211      * execute query and return useful data depending on query-type
00212      *
00213      *      SELECT / SHOW                                           => resultset array
00214      *      REPLACE / UPDATE / DELETE / ALTER                       => affected rows (int)
00215      *      INSERT                                                  => last insert id (int)
00216      *      RENAME / LOCK / UNLOCK / TRUNCATE /SET / CREATE / DROP  => Returns if the operation was successfull (boolean)
00217      *
00218      * @param string $s sql-statement
00219      * @param string $idname which field-value to use as the key of the returned array (false=dont care)
00220      * @return array
00221      */
00222     function & query($s, $idnames = false, $fields = false) {
00223         $result = null;
00224         switch ($this->getSqlCommand($s)) {
00225             case 'replace' :
00226             case 'update' :
00227             case 'delete' :
00228             case 'alter' :
00229             case 'call':
00230                 $this->execute($s);
00231                 $result = $this->lastAffected();
00232                 break;
00233             case 'insert' :
00234                 $this->execute($s);
00235                 $result = $this->lastInsertId();
00236                 break;
00237             case 'select' :
00238             case 'show' :
00239                 if (is_string($idnames)) {
00240                     $idnames = array (
00241                         $idnames
00242                     );
00243                 }
00244                 $this->execute($s);
00245                 $result = $this->lastResult($idnames, $fields);
00246                 break;
00247             default :
00248                 $this->execute($s);
00249                 $result = $this->result;
00250                 break;
00251         }
00252         return $result;
00253     }
00254 
00255     /**
00256      * escape the given string so it can be safely appended to any sql
00257      * @param string $sql string to escape
00258      * @return string
00259      */
00260     function escape($sql) {
00261         if (!$this->link) {
00262             $this->connect();
00263         }
00264         return mysql_real_escape_string($sql, $this->link);
00265     }

00267     /**
00268      * return sql needed to convert unix timestamp to datetime
00269      * @param integer $t unixtime
00270      * @return string
00271     */
00272     function makeDateTime($t) {
00273         return 'FROM_UNIXTIME(' . $t . ')';
00274     }

00276     /**
00277      * output any queries made, how long it took, the result and any errors if DEBUG>1
00278      */
00279     function __destruct() {
00280         if (DEBUG > 0) {
00281             array_unshift($this->queries, array (
00282                 'line',
00283                 '',
00284                 'affected',
00285                 'error',
00286                 'time'
00287             ));
00288             kataDebugOutput($this->queries, true);
00289         }
00290         if ((bool) $this->link) {
00291             //sometimes the resource FNORDs
00292             if (is_resource($this->link) && (get_resource_type($this->link) == 'mysql link')) {
00293                 mysql_close($this->link);
00294             }
00295             $this->link = null;
00296         }
00297     }

00299     private function getFieldSize($str) {
00300         $x1 = strpos($str, '(');
00301         $x2 = strpos($str, ')');
00302         if ((false !== $x1) && (false !== $x2)) {
00303             return substr($str, $x1 +1, $x2 - $x1 -1);
00304         }
00305         return 0;
00306     }
00307 
00308     /**
00309      * return the Sql-Command of given Query
00310      * @param string $sql query
00311      * @return string Sql-Command
00312      */
00313     private function getSqlCommand($sql) {
00314         $sql = str_replace(array (
00315             "(",
00316             "\t",
00317             "\n"
00318         ), " ", $sql);
00319         $Sqlparts = explode(" ", trim($sql));
00320         return strtolower($Sqlparts[0]);
00321     }

00323     /**
00324      * build a sql-string that returns first matching row
00325      * @param string $sql query
00326      * @param string $perPage expression
00327      * @return string (limited) Query
00328      */
00329     function getFirstRowQuery($sql, $perPage) {
00330         return sprintf('%s LIMIT %d', $sql, $perPage);
00331     }
00332 
00333     /**
00334      * build a sql-string that returns paged data
00335      * @return string finished query
00336      */
00337     function getPageQuery($sql, $page, $perPage) {
00338         return sprintf('%s LIMIT %d,%d', $sql, ($page -1) * $perPage, $perPage);
00339     }

00341     /**
00342      * try to reduce the fields of given table to the basic types bool, unixdate, int, string, float, date, enum
00343      *
00344      * <code>example:
00345      *
00346      * Array
00347      * (
00348      *     [table] => test
00349      *     [primary] => Array
00350      *     [identity]=> a
00351      *     [cols] => Array
00352      *         (
00353      *             [a] => Array
00354      *                 (
00355      *                     [default] => CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
00356      *                     [null] =>
00357      *                     [key]    => 'PRI'
00358      *                     [length] => 0
00359      *                     [type] => date
00360      *                 )
00361      *
00362      *             [g] => Array
00363      *                 (
00364      *                     [default] =>
00365      *                     [null] =>
00366      *                     [key]    => 'UNI'
00367      *                     [length] => 0
00368      *                     [type] => unsupported:time
00369      *                 )
00370      *         )
00371      *
00372      * )
00373      * </code>
00374      *
00375      * @param string $tableName name of the table to analyze
00376      * @return unknown
00377      */
00378     function & describe($tableName) {
00379         $primaryKey = array ();
00380         $identity = null;
00381         $desc = array ();
00382         $cols = array ();
00383         $sql = "SHOW COLUMNS FROM " . $tableName;
00384         $r = mysql_query($sql, $this->getLink());
00385         if (false == $r) {
00386             throw new Exception('model: cant describe, missing rights?');
00387         }
00388         $noResult = true;
00389         while ($row = mysql_fetch_assoc($r)) {
00390             $noResult = false;
00391             $data = array ();
00392             $data['default'] = $row['Default'];
00393             $data['null'] = 'NO' != $row['Null'];
00394             $data['length'] = 0;
00395             if ('auto_increment' == $row['Extra']) {
00396                 $identity = $row['Field'];
00397             }
00398             //keys
00399             if ('PRI' == $row['Key']) {
00400                 $primaryKey[] = $row['Field'];
00401             }
00402             $data['key'] = $row['Key'];
00403 
00404             //type
00405             $x = strpos($row['Type'], '(');
00406             $type = $x!==false ? substr($row['Type'], 0, $x) : $row['Type'];
00407             switch ($type) {
00408                 case 'bit' :
00409                     $data['type'] = 'bool';
00410                     $data['length'] = 1;
00411                     break;
00412                 case 'bigint' :
00413                 case 'int' :
00414                 case 'smallint' :
00415                 case 'tinyint' :
00416                 case 'decimal':
00417                     $data['length'] = $this->getFieldSize($row['Type']);
00418                     $data['type'] = 'int';
00419                     break;
00420                 case 'char' :
00421                 case 'varchar' :
00422                     $data['length'] = $this->getFieldSize($row['Type']);
00423                     $data['type'] = 'string';
00424                     break;
00425                 case 'text' :
00426                     $data['type'] = 'string';
00427                     break;
00428                 case 'float' :
00429                 case 'double' :
00430                 case 'real' :
00431                     $data['type'] = 'float';
00432                     break;
00433                 case 'date' :
00434                 case 'datetime' :
00435                 case 'time' :
00436                 case 'timestamp' :
00437                     $data['type'] = 'date';
00438                     break;
00439                 case 'set':
00440                     $data['type'] = 'set';
00441                     $data['values']  = 'foo';
00442                 case 'blob':
00443                     
00444                     break;
00445             }
00446             $cols[$row['Field']] = $data;
00447         }
00448 
00449         if ($noResult === true) {
00450             throw new Exception('table does not exists in selected Database');
00451         }
00452 
00453         $desc = array (
00454             'table' => str_replace(array (
00455                 $this->quoteLeft,
00456                 $this->quoteRight
00457             ), '', $tableName),
00458             'primary' => $primaryKey,
00459             'identity' => $identity,
00460             'cols' => $cols
00461         );
00462         return $desc;
00463     }

00556     /**
00557      * a copy of the matching db-config entry in config/database.php
00558      * @param $string $what spezifies what to get ... null=complete config array
00559      * @return array|string
00560      */
00561     function getConfig($what = null) {
00562         if (!empty ($what)) {
00563             return (isset ($this->dbconfig[$what])) ? $this->dbconfig[$what] : '';
00564         }
00565         return $this->dbconfig;
00566     }
00567 
00568     /**
00569      * set db-config entry
00570      * @param $array $config
00571      */
00572     function setConfig($config) {
00573         if (empty ($this->dbconfig)) {
00574             $this->dbconfig = $config;
00575         }
00576     }

00578     /**
00579     * used to quote table and field names
00580     * @param string $s string to enquote;
00581     * @return string enquoted string
00582     */
00583     function quoteName($s) {
00584         return $this->quoteLeft . $s . $this->quoteRight;
00585     }

00587     /**
00588      * checks if given operator is valid
00589      * @param string $operator
00590      * @return boolean
00591      */
00592     function isValidOperator($operator) {
00593         if (empty ($operator)) {
00594             return false;
00595         }
00596         $ops = array (
00597             '<=>'=>1,
00598             '='=>1,
00599             '>='=>1,
00600             '>'=>1,
00601             '<='=>1,
00602             '<'=>1,
00603             '<>'=>1,
00604             '!='=>1,
00605             'like'=>1,
00606             'not like'=>1,
00607             'is not null'=>1,
00608             'is null'=>1,
00609             'in'=>1,
00610             'not in'=>1,
00611             'between'=>1
00612         );
00613         return isset($ops[$operator]); 
00614     }
